overview: Wang Shi, the dizzy business guide of the dire business, came across a peach girl who was killed by the evil ninja. Under the pressure of Peach, Wang Shi and her embarked on a journey to find the ninja blade and other female ninjas. When everything is ready, the peach of Hattori is captured by the evil ninja, and Wang Shi has become the key to launching the ninja blade. In order to defeat the evil magic ninja's Baqi Serpent Illusion, Wang Shi in the kimono department decided to let go.
title: Yamata Snake
